articles.description: South Africa end their run of semi-final heartache by thrashing Afghanistan to reach their first men's T20 World Cup final.

articles.description: One of the nation's most celebrated swimmers will hang up her goggles after failing to qualify for Paris 2024.

articles.description: In the space of a month in 2012, Andy Murray went from tears in the rain to gold in the sunshine, winning hearts and medals on Centre Court.

articles.description: In 2021, La Palma's volcanos erupted, issuing tonnes of molten rock and a reminder of the perilious nature of the island's premier running race.
